wowapi.api module¶

class wowapi.api.API(client_id: str, client_secret: str, client_region: str = 'us', client_locale: str = 'en_US', max_parallel_requests: int = 50, max_request_retries: int = 3, request_retry_delay: int = 1)¶

Bases: object

This is our core API class with methods for interacting with Battle.net’s various APIs

Parameters

  • client_id (str) – A Battle.net Project Client ID - Generated at https://develop.battle.net/access/clients

  • client_secret (str) – A Battle.net Project Client Secret - Generated at https://develop.battle.net/access/clients

  • client_region (str, optional) – The Battle.net/WoW API region which we submit requests to, defaults to ‘us’

  • client_locale (str, optional) – The locale used for API requests. Compatbility varies by region, see https://develop.battle.net/documentation/guides/regionality-and-apis, defaults to ‘en_US’

  • max_parallel_requests (int, optional) – The maximum number of parallel aiohttp requests

  • max_request_retries (int, optional) – The maximum number of aiohttp request retries (min 1)

  • request_retry_delay (int, optional) – The delay between aiohttp request retries (min 0) (This value is in seconds)

async get_access_token() → str¶

Returns and / or generates an API access token using the provided credentials in the class constructor

Raises

RequestException – Raised when we encounter an issue when making an aiohttp request.

Returns

A Battle.net OAuth Access Token

Return type

str

async get_resource(hostname: str, api_endpoint: str, params: Optional[dict] = None, auth: Optional[aiohttp.helpers.BasicAuth] = None, method: str = 'GET') → Optional[dict]¶

Make an API request and return the response as a JSON dictionary

Parameters

  • api_endpoint (str) – The API endpoint following the regional hostname we wish to send a request to.

  • params (dict, optional) – The additional arguments/parameters we need to send with the request, defaults to None

  • method (str, optional) – The HTTP request method to be used, defaults to ‘GET’

Raises

  • RequestMethodException – Raised when an invalid HTTP request method is selected.

  • RequestException – Raised when we encounter an issue when making an aiohttp request.

Returns

The response from the API as a JSON dictionary

Return type

dict

async multi_request(requests: list) → list¶

Make several API requests in parallel

Parameters

requests (list) – A list of API request coroutines

Returns

The API responses as a list of dicts

Return type

list

set_locale(locale: str) → None¶

Sets the locale we’ll use for API requests

Parameters

locale (str) – The desired locale to be used for API requests.

Raises

InvalidLocaleException – Raised when the string given doesn’t match any of the current region’s supported locales

set_region(region: str) → None¶

Sets the region we’ll use for API requests

Parameters

region (str) – The desired region to be used for API requests

Raises

InvalidRegionException – Raised when the provided region isn’t in our supported regions dictionary
